CustomField.description: Please tell us the challenges the Young Person is experiencing that they would like help with. Note - If the Young People is needing support with something that is not listed, please let us know. This is not a comprehensive list of the supports we provide.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please tell us the challenges the Young Person is experiencing that they would like help with. Note - If the Young People is needing support with something that is not listed, please let us know. This is not a comprehensive list of the supports we provide.
CustomField.label: Young Person Challenges

value.fullName: Sexual health (including contraception and sexual health checks)
value.label: Sexual health (including contraception and sexual health checks)

value.fullName: Alcohol or other drugs negatively impacting Young Person's life
value.label: Alcohol or other drugs negatively impacting Young Person's life
